title: get in touch
subtitle: Send me your idea and let’s build it
body_title: Write, call or just fill out the form
description: If you have a project, suggestion or just want to say hi, fill out the form and I’ll get back to you. I'm always open to new collaborations.

error.name: The name couldn't be empty.
error.email: The email couldn't be empty and should be well formed.

messages.info: The form is not valid. Please be sure that the fields are not empty and that the email is correct.
messages.error: Oh oh... something went wrong. Please try again and if the error persist send me an email or call me.
messages.success: The message was sent successfully. I will contact you as soon as possible. Thanks!
